description: In nova/virt/images.py, if qemu-img command fails or the image is missing, instead of returning en empty QemuImgInfo it should probably throw some exception to inform the caller of the situation instead of hiding the problem like it does today.
title: qemu_image_info should not return empty QemuImgInfo objects

comments.content: In nova/virt/images.py, if qemu-img command fails or the image is missing, instead of returning en empty QemuImgInfo it should probably throw some exception to inform the caller of the situation instead of hiding the problem like it does today.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hanlind

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/26873
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This is a valid bug, and actually something we should probably prioritize as it makes debugging pretty hard if it goes wrong.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
